item.description:
Go to to this Yahoo Group link and request to join:

 

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/MassBaySailors/

 

OR

Go to to this FaceBook Group link and request to join:

 

https://www.facebook.com/#!/groups/41673974926/

 

The Yahoo Group currently has 455 members & the FB Group has 215.  These are mostly Metro Boston area sailors, owners and crew.

 

A Massachusetts Bay (New England) Sailing E-Group Open to ALL who want to share (Read and/or Post) any topic RELATIVE to: SAILING; Sail Boats; Gear; Cruising, Group Cruises; Sail Travel; Races, Regatta’s; Crew; Safety; Navigation; Electronics; Instruments; Weather; Sailing News; Nautical; Marine; Purchase; Sell; Reviews … etc. PLEASE let’s keep this VERY upbeat and positive keeping away from non-sailing related social, political or personal topics. Legislative issues relating to recreational boating and the environment of course are o.k. too. Let’s try to keep this as a Great source for, help knowledge, communication and social entertainment.
item.how_to_find_us: The Yahoo E-Group MassBaySailors and the FB Group too
item.name: MassBaySailors join its Yahoo & FaceBook Groups!
